flawed_nl_solution:
If $44000 is $1000 less than five times more than he had made on his previous painting, then $44000+$1000 = $45000 is five times what he made on his previous painting.
If $45000 is five times what he made for his previous painting, then he made $45000/5 = $<<45000/5=90000>>90000 for selling his previous painting.
#### 90000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9000, not 90000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
